data.title: New York Magazine
data.meta_description: See an archive of all graydon carter stories published on the New York Media network, which includes NYMag, The Cut, Vulture, and Grub Street.
data.text:
stop the presses May 24, 2023

David Zaslav and Graydon Carter’s Cannes Buddy MovieWarner Bros. is a hundred years old, Hollywood is paralyzed by a strike, and the Dom Pérignon is flowing by the pool at the Hôtel du Cap-Eden-Roc.

stop the presses Mar. 31, 2022

Graydon Carter Hosts a Vanity Fair Ancien Régime ReunionAt Dana Brown’s book party for Dilettante, Carter came out as pro-union and said he wouldn’t have let Will Smith into his Oscars after-party.

jeffrey epstein Aug. 23, 2019

Jeffrey Epstein Used a Bullet, Dead Cat to Intimidate Graydon Carter: ReportA former Vanity Fair editor says Epstein placed a decapitated cat and a bullet outside Carter’s homes to pressure him to tell reporters to back off.

media Apr. 11, 2019

Graydon Carter Doesn’t ‘Even Subscribe’ to Time MagazineHe admits in a THR guest column that he also turned down offers to run the publication.

cartoons Sept. 12, 2018

Graydon Carter Has a Real Talent for Drawing NosesSee his cartooning debut, in Esquire.

media June 21, 2018

Graydon Carter Is Reportedly Launching a Media Company About Rich EuropeansAccording to the Post, Carter’s future company will be like “Axios for celebrities and entertainment.”

media Sept. 7, 2017

Graydon Carter Is Leaving Vanity Fair After 25 YearsThe end of an era.

the magazine world Jan. 6, 2017

Graydon Carter Really Doesn’t Want to Meet With Donald Trump“It wouldn’t be my first choice to spend a Friday morning in a group like that,” the Vanity Fair editor said.

the magazine world Jan. 5, 2017

Trump Will Reportedly Meet With Anna Wintour and Graydon CarterBut will they talk about his short fingers?

sad! Dec. 15, 2016

Of Course Vanity Fair Trashed Trump’s Restaurant, and of Course He RetaliatedHe hears the circulation numbers are “way down, big trouble, dead!”

interviews Aug. 10, 2016

Why This Chef Took a Risk and Bought One of NYC’s Most Notorious Restaurants“This was an opportunity to bring this place back from the dead.”

Apr. 24, 2015

10 Fashion People Envision Their Dream WearableMichael Kors wants “Samantha Stephens on my wrist”; Daphne Guinness is out to disrupt the zipper.

party pics May 19, 2014

Party Pics: Bieber, J.Law, and More in Cannes Highlights from the Vanity Fair and Armani party.

party pics Apr. 24, 2014

Party Pics: Meryl Streep, Lake Bell, Anna Wintour, and MoreHighlights from Hollywood and Tribeca.

party pics Mar. 3, 2014

fake feuds Feb. 4, 2014

Gwyneth-Gate Is Officially Not a Goop Coup Graydon Carter is sorry to disappoint.

encounters Nov. 25, 2013

Meet the New Potato’s Founders: Food’s New ‘It’ GirlsLaura and Danielle Kosann are marrying fashion and food with remarkable success.

quotables Sept. 9, 2013

Gwyneth Paltrow Rallies Famous Friends Against Vanity FairAsks them not to be quoted.

Lawsuits July 15, 2013

Graydon Carter Sued by Former Monkey Bar Food RunnerThe former employee claims he was paid minimum wage, tips were withheld, and he was mistreated by the kitchen staff.

depth of field July 11, 2013

Larry Fink, the Counter-Culture Artist Turned Celebrity PhotographerHe turned down Jay-Z’s personal invite to watch a basketball game from box seats to relax at his barn.

pip pip hooray June 5, 2013

Pippa Pens Column About Wimbledon for Vanity Fair“She’s a keen observer of classic British pastimes,” says Graydon Carter.

Restaurant Review Apr. 7, 2013

Platt: Graydon Carter Turns the Beatrice Inn Into His Latest Neo-SpeakeasyOver the years, he’s had much better luck replicating this carefully calibrated formula than finding decent chefs.

Chef Shuffle Jan. 30, 2013

Brian Nasworthy Has Left the Beatrice InnA new chef will be named next month.

nice things Jan. 28, 2013

Graydon Carter Too Good for ApronsBut he did memorize the specials to wait on a table at the Beatrice Inn.

nightlife is dead Dec. 10, 2012

The Oral History of the Beatrice InnRe-creating the bar that Chloë Sevigny, Kate Moss, and the Olsens called home.

Openings Nov. 14, 2012

The Beatrice Inn Is Open; Here’s Its E-mail AddressThe Beatrice comes back as a steakhouse.

nice things Nov. 13, 2012

Graydon Carter Could Spoon-Feed You Dinner Thanks to Hurricane SandyHeeeere comes the airplane — I mean, private jet.

Snakes Down Near Jane Nov. 8, 2012

Yes, There Will Be a Snake Venom Cocktail at the New Beatrice InnThis wasn’t in the bartender’s manual.

Openings Oct. 3, 2012

Trouble at the Beatrice: Opening Delayed Over Issues With the Menu and the NameNo matter what, we’re looking forward to it.

Fall Preview Aug. 19, 2012

What to Expect at Graydon Carter’s New Beatrice Inn and John DeLucie’s Bill’sHere’s what they’re planning this fall.

Putting Out Fires June 26, 2012

Hot Spots: Waverly Inn, and Its Mural, Hit by FireGraydon Carter’s restaurant was closed for business, but it should be back soon.

Construction June 6, 2012

Beatrice Inn Beset With DelaysDon’t plan any of your hot summer shindigs there just yet.

wall street June 6, 2012

Graydon Carter Cheers Jamie Dimon’s Downfall, Introduces the ‘Carter Rule’It’s not as catchy as the Dimon Rule.

Openings May 3, 2012

Democracy and Transparency at Graydon Carter’s Beatrice InnWe’ll believe it when we see it.

party chat Apr. 19, 2012

An Underdressed Judd Apatow Was Right to Fear Graydon Carter“He is capable of looking better.”

Rebirth Mar. 27, 2012

Bros Dec. 23, 2011

Graydon Carter Indebted to Ken Friedman, Damon Wise Opening Own RestaurantThe restaurant won some stars, but is it in the safety zone?

Openings Dec. 7, 2011

Graydon Carter–Designed Beatrice Inn Overhaul Aims to Open Early Next YearThe revamp will specialize in affordable comfort food.

Re-openings Dec. 2, 2011

Graydon Carter Apparently Involved With the Beatrice Inn Revamp After AllA newly submitted liquor license application indicates that the ‘Vanity Fair’ editor will be taking over the former Beatrice Inn space.

Entertaining Sept. 22, 2011

Bored to Death to Feature Pretend Waverly Inn; Real Waverly Eats It UpOf course George Christopher is now a restaurateur.

Empire Building Feb. 23, 2011

John DeLucie Takes Former Bruno Jamais SpaceAnd a couple of more chef moves.

R.I.P. Feb. 16, 2011

Amy Sacco Likes the Idea of Graydon Carter Buying Elaine’sSacco says Elaine Kauffman was like her “fairy godmother.”

adult clubhouses Feb. 16, 2011

Is Graydon Carter Trying to Buy Elaine’s?Restaurateur Ken Aretsky would be part of the deal.

bromances Dec. 13, 2010

party chat Nov. 4, 2010
